instruction.h
00001 /*******************************************************************************
00002  *  instruction.h
00003  *  Instruction object. Each instruction is placed into the instruction window for
00004  *  fetch and then removed from the window when commited.
00005  ******************************************************************************/
00006

00018 typedef enum {noStatus, fetch, ready, chain, execute, complete, sideReady, sideBuffer} status;
00019 typedef enum {noType, ALU, MEM, FPU, BR, ASSIGN} type;
00020 typedef enum {none, READ, WRITE} memType;
00021 typedef enum {noBrMode, noBr, allBr, statPredBr, scheduleBr, lowBiasBr, dynPredBr} brMode;
